mapper.sql: select T.ROW_ID as id, T.CREATED as created, T.CREATED_BY as createdBy, TO_CHAR(T.LAST_UPD, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as lastUpdated, T.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy, T.CORP_ID corpid, t.ex_ip exIp, t.username username, t.ex_url exUrl, t.ex_params exParams, t.ex_des exDes, t.ex_model exModel, t.ex_log exLog, t.error_log errorLog
mapper.insert: insert into lnk_sys_log (row_id, created, ex_ip, ex_url, ex_params, ex_model, ex_log, error_log, ex_des, username) values (S_SEQUENCE_LOG.Nextval, sysdate, #{exIp}, #{exUrl}, #{exParams}, #{exModel}, #{exLog}, #{errorLog}, #{exDes}, #{username})
